en.footer_info: Earliest record time: **{first_record_time_str}**, latest record time: **{latest_record_time_str}**, index lines: **{latest_db_records}**, video storage: **{videos_file_size} GB** ({videos_files_count} video files)
en.text_cannot_open_img: The image seems to be damaged, please delete the corresponding image in the result_ folder and try again.
en.oneday_toggle_search_help: Supports searching with multiple keywords separated by space. Press Enter directly without entering any content to list all data for the day.
en.oneday_search_md_none: âš  No results found
en.oneday_text_generate_timeline_thumbnail: Generating timeline thumbnails for today, please wait...
en.oneday_md_no_enough_thunmbnail_for_timel: Not enough thumbnails to generate a timeline for the day.
en.oneday_text_not_found_vid_but_has_data: Video file for this time not found on disk, but text data is available for retrieval.
en.oneday_text_data_indexing_wait_and_refre: Data is being indexed, please wait a few minutes and refresh.
en.oneday_text_no_found_record_and_vid_on_d: No video file or index record found on disk for this time.
en.oneday_text_generate_word_cloud: Generating today's word cloud, please wait...
en.oneday_md_word_cloud_turn_off: Daily word cloud disabled, go to settings to enable.
en.oneday_text_has_vid_but_not_index: No data index in the database for this day. However, there is a video on the disk that has not been indexed yet, please go to 'Settings' to index. â†’
en.oneday_text_vid_and_data_not_found: Data index and video file not found for this day.
en.gs_input_search_help: Multiple keywords can be separated by space.
en.gs_input_exclude_help: Exclude contents of which keywords, leave blank for no exclusion. Multiple keywords can be separated by space.
en.gs_text_pls_choose_full_date_range: Please select a complete time range
en.gs_text_intro: This is the global search page where you can search all the recorded content to date. Press Enter to search after entering the keywords.
en.stat_text_no_month_word_cloud_pic: No word cloud image for this month.
en.stat_text_no_month_lightbox: No lightbox image for this month.
en.rs_text_need_to_restart_after_save_setti: After saving the settings on this page, you need to restart the 'start_app.bat' to take effect.
en.rs_text_recording_screen_now: Continuously recording the screen, refresh to check the latest running status. If you want to stop recording the screen, please manually close the "Windrecorder - Recording Screening" terminal window in the background.
en.rs_text_not_recording_screen: Not currently recording the screen. Refresh to check the latest running status.
en.rs_checkbox_start_record_when_startup: Automatically start the app after booting up
en.rs_checkbox_start_record_when_startup_he: After applied, a shortcut will be created for 'start_app.bat' and placed in the system's startup directory. This behavior may be misjudged as a virus and cause 'start_webui.bat' to be removed by some security software, if any interception, please remove it from the isolation area and mark it as trusted software. Or manually create a shortcut for 'start_app.bat' and place it in the system's startup folder.
en.rs_md_only_support_main_monitor: âš  Currently only supports recording main monitor.
en.rs_input_stop_recording_when_screen_free: Pause recording the next video clip when the screen has not changed for a few minutes (0 for never pause)
en.rs_text_ocr_auto_update: Automatically index when the video clip is recorded (recommended)
en.rs_input_vid_compress_time: Compress original video after it is kept for a few days
en.rs_selectbox_compress_ratio: Compress to the original screen size
en.rs_selectbox_compress_ratio_help: 0.75 times side scaling can compress the original video volume to 1/4, 0.5 times to 1/8, 0.25 times to 1/16. Compression ratio may vary depending on the video's specific content.
en.rs_checkbox_enable_half_res_while_hidpi: For 'high DPI/high resolution screens', scale to quarter resolution when recording
en.rs_text_enable_half_res_while_hidpi: Screen resolutions with a height greater than 1500 will be considered 'high DPI/high resolution screens' and their recorded video resolution will be reduced to a quarter of the original. For example, on a 4k monitor of 3840x2160, the resolution of the recorded video will be 1920x1080. After turning on this option, you can reduce the size of the initially recorded video, but it will also lead to a decrease in OCR recognition accuracy. You can turn this option off if you use smaller fonts/zooming on a high-resolution screen, or find that OCR recognition is less accurate.
en.set_checkbox_shutdown_after_updated: Shut down the computer after update
en.set_selectbox_local_ocr_engine_help: It is recommended to use Windows built-in Windows.Media.Ocr.Cli for OCR, which is faster and consumes less resources.
en.set_input_exclude_word: Skip indexing when one of the following words exists in OCR
en.set_input_exclude_word_help: When you do not want some screens/applications to be indexed, you can add the keywords that may appear in them, separated by commas. For example, to not record the query screen in Wind Recorder, you can add ", Wind Recorder".
en.set_md_ocr_ignore_area: **OCR area to ignore on the screen edges**
en.set_md_ocr_ignore_area_help: Enter number as percentage, i.e., '6' == 6%. This option allows to ignore elements at the edges of the screen during OCR, such as browser tabs, Windows Start Menu, in-page advertisements, etc.
en.set_toggle_use_screenshot_as_refer: Use the current screenshot as reference
en.set_checkbox_show_wordcloud_under_oneday: Show Daily Word Cloud under 'One Day'
en.set_checkbox_use_similar_zh_char_to_sear: Use Chinese similar characters for searching
OCR may misrecognize similar characters, enabling this option will search for similar shapes simultaneously to the keyword, improving the hit rate of the results.
en.set_input_wordcloud_filter: Filter the following words in the word cloud generation:
en.set_input_wordcloud_filter_help: Some UI keywords may persistently appear, resulting in higher frequency in the data. Here, you can exclude them from the word cloud's statistics.
en.set_input_oneday_timeline_thumbnail_num: Number of horizontal thumbnails in 'One Day' Timelines
en.set_input_oneday_timeline_thumbnail_num_: If you want the thumbnail density in 'One Day' timelines to be higher, you can increase this value. Cached thumbnails in the 'result_timeline' folder may need to be deleted for the change to take effect.
en.set_text_video_not_index: There are {nocred_count} videos waiting to be indexed. Expected time: <{timeCostStr}>. (There are {count} files on disk.)
en.set_text_no_video_need_index: No new videos need indexing at the moment.  (There are {count} files on disk.)
en.set_text_one_video_to_index: 1 video is being recorded, no new videos need indexing at the moment.  (There are {count} files on disk.)
en.set_text_some_video_will_be_index: There are {nocred_count} videos that will be indexed automatically. (There are {count} files on disk.)
en.set_text_updating_db: Updating database, please do not operate or refresh the page. You can view the updating process in the background command line interface. Estimated time required: {estimate_time_str}
en.set_input_max_num_search_page: In global search, maximum number of results per page
en.set_update_latest: The current version is already up to date.
en.set_update_new: ğŸ’« A new version {tool_version} has been detected. Update by opening `install_update_setting.bat` file in the directory.
en.qs_la_text_same_as_previous: The interface language remains the same as before: English
en.qs_un_set_your_username: Set your username as a database identifier.
en.qs_un_describe: Press enter to use the current username: [{sys_username}], or type a custom username (up to 20 characters).
en.qs_un_longer_than_expect: Exceeded the length limit (20 half-width English characters / 10 full-width Chinese characters).
en.qs_olang_intro: The system has the following languages installed. Select one as the main language for OCR detection:
en.qs_olang_ocrlang_set_to: The main language for OCR detection has been set to:
en.qs_olang_error: The input should be a number.
en.qs_olang_one_choice_default_set:
The system language is {os_support_lang}, which has been applied as the main language for OCR detection.
(Not the required language? Please check whether the input method/language pack of the selected language is installed on the system.
(https: //learn.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.media.ocr)
en.qs_ocr_result_describe: Accuracy: {accuracy}, Recognition Time: {timecost}, Time Required to Index a 15-minute Video: {timecost_15}
en.qs_ocr_describe: > It is recommended to use the built-in Windows.Media.Ocr.Cli, which has faster speed and lower performance consumption.
en.qs_ocr_describe_disable_clo:
> chineseocr_lite_onnx has been disabled due to compatibility issues. 
(Enabled by modifying 'enable_ocr_chineseocr_lite_onnx':true in user_config.json.)
en.qs_ocr_tips_low_accuracy:
! Accuracy too low? Please check whether the input method/language pack for the selected language is installed on your system. 
(https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.media.ocr)
In addition, the test case may not be accurate, please refer to the actual situation.
en.qs_ocr_cta: Please select the OCR engine for extracting screen content:
en.qs_mo_describe: Note: Due to the lack of official support for multiple monitors in pyautogui, Windrecorder will only record the screen set as the 'primary display' in Windows.
en.qs_mo_detect: The detected resolution of the primary display is: {monitor_width}x{monitor_height}
en.qs_mo_cta: This setting will be automatically detected each time you start recording, so you don't need to choose or set it separately.
en.qs_end_describe:
Congratulations! You have completed all the initial settings. Don't worry, you can open 'start_webui.bat' at any time to adjust the settings!

Now, you can open 'start_app.bat' in the directory to start recording the screen content.
Use 'start_webui.bat' in the directory to index your data and adjust more personalized options.
en.qs_end_slogan: > Capture and preserve the fleeting moments of the wind, as seen through your eyes.
en.qs_end_feedback: > Encountered a problem or have suggestions? Feel free to submit issues and PRs at https://github.com/yuka-friends/Windrecorder.
en.tray_webui_address: ğŸ¦ Browser access {address_port} to enter the page
en.tray_version_info: ğŸš€ It is currently the latest version {version}
en.tray_notify_text: Pause recording and search memories through the tray menu
en.tray_notify_text_start_without_record: Start recording and search memories through the tray menu
